pkgmetadata.longdescription: Information-Theoretic Measures for Spatial Association // Leveraging information-theoretic measures like mutual information and v-measure to quantify spatial associations between patterns (Nowosad and Stepinski (2018) doi:10.1080/13658816.2018.1511794; Bai, H. et al. (2023) doi:10.1080/24694452.2023.2223700).
